Question
========
What is the quickest built-in way to browse and switch Positron color themes?

Answerlist
----------
* Click the gear icon, then Themes > Color Theme
* Install a third-party theme manager extension
* Edit the settings JSON file by hand 
* Themes cannot be changed in Positron

Solution
========
Themes are available directly from the gear menu via Themes > Color Theme.
